title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 810.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 810.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part implements Labor Law, section 27-a, subdivision
14 which provides, in part, for the promulgation of rules and regulations
setting forth procedures and criteria necessary and appropriate to carry out
the provisions of article 29 of the Labor Law, establishing a training and
education program on occupational safety and health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
810.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
